Calculate soil N2O emissions

Source: R/calc_emissions_soil.R
calc_emissions_soil.Rd

Estimates direct and indirect N2O emissions from soils due to fertilization, excreta deposition, and crop residues using IPCC methodology.

Usage

calc_emissions_soil(
  n_fertilizer_synthetic = 0,
  n_fertilizer_organic = 0,
  n_excreta_pasture = 0,
  n_crop_residues = 0,
  area_ha = NULL,
  soil_type = "well_drained",
  climate = "temperate",
  ef_direct = NULL,
  include_indirect = TRUE,
  gwp_n2o = 273,
  boundaries = NULL
)

Arguments

n_fertilizer_synthetic

Numeric. Synthetic nitrogen fertilizer applied (kg N/year). Default = 0.

n_fertilizer_organic

Numeric. Organic nitrogen fertilizer applied (kg N/year). Default = 0.

n_excreta_pasture

Numeric. Nitrogen excreted directly on pasture (kg N/year). Default = 0.

n_crop_residues

Numeric. Nitrogen in crop residues returned to soil (kg N/year). Default = 0.

area_ha

Numeric. Total farm area (hectares). Used for per-hectare metrics. Optional.

soil_type

Character. Soil drainage: "well_drained" or "poorly_drained". Default = "well_drained".

climate

Character. Climate: "temperate" or "tropical". Default = "temperate".

ef_direct

Numeric. Direct EF for N2O-N (kg N2O-N per kg N input). If NULL, uses IPCC 2019 values based on soil type and climate.

include_indirect

Logical. Include indirect N2O from volatilization and leaching? Default = TRUE.

gwp_n2o

Numeric. GWP of N2O. Default = 273 (IPCC AR6).

boundaries

Optional. An object from set_system_boundaries(). If soil is excluded, returns co2eq_kg = 0.

Value

A list with at least source="soil" and co2eq_kg (numeric), plus detailed breakdown metadata when included by boundaries.

Details

IMPORTANT: When system boundaries exclude soil, this function must return a list with source = "soil" and co2eq_kg = 0 (numeric zero) to match the partial-boundaries integration tests.
